358:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'nupūrveṇa rorukaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā yena ajitaseno nāma gṛhapatistenopasaṃkramya ajitasenasya gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha-mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam|
358:2: na ca jānāmi-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
358:4: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti|
358:5: tadvadatu me āryaḥ-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
358:7: āha-mayā kulaputra akṣayalakṣaṇo nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
358:9: gaccha kulaputra iyamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe dharmagrāme śivarāgro nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati|
358:12: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'jitasenasya gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ajitasenaṃ gṛhapatimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya ajitasenasya gṛhapaterantikātprakrāntaḥ||49||
